content.content: Focus On #13: Centrifuge Q3 Update       View the slides from the presentation For the 13th episode of Focus On, we will be joined by the Centrifuge team for a Q3 update. This will be a holistic update, with the team first presenting a review of Centrifuge and Tinlake, and what they’ve achieved since starting to tokenize real-world assets on chain with Maker. The team will also review how their success has been driven by their fundamental beliefs and core principles, and how this is preparing them for an exciting future into 2023 and beyond.  Sneak Peak of the Future  Being a dedicated MakerDAO ecosystem partner, Centrifuge is excited to share their perspectives on MetaDAOs and will explore potential alignment opportunities within a MetaDAO cluster with support from their partner, Blocktower.  Join us!  @juan and @retro will host.  Agenda:  Overview of Centrifuge and Tinlake history and achievements Review of Centrifuge’s fundamental beliefs and core principles Exploring Centrifuge’s perspective on MetaDAOs Discuss MetaDAO cluster, in partnership with Blocktower   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2022-09-07T16:00:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where Crowdcast call   crowdcast    Focus On #13 | Centrifuge Q3 Update Register now for Focus On #13 | Centrifuge Q3 Update on crowdcast, scheduled to go live on September 7, 2022, 11:00 AM CDT.      Attn: @Recognized-Delegates, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit, @Risk-Core-Unit, @SES-Core-Unit, @Protocol-Engineering, @Growth-Core-Unit, @gov-comms-core-unit, @collateral-core-unit, @data-insights-cu, @immunefi-core-unit, @strat-fin-core-unit @Khan @roollie

Focus On Call - Episode #13  September 7th, 2022  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Retro  00:56: Discussion and Questions with Centrifuge team  52:37: Outro   Video https://youtu.be/7W_YSQzYGow  Introduction  Retro  Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Welcome everyone to Focus On #13. Today we have an exciting crowd to catch up with Centrifuge for their Q3 update. We are joined by a couple of smiling faces from the Centrifuge team: Lucas Vogelsang, Colin Cunningham, Kevin Chan, and Asad Khan For other episodes of FO, please check the forum.   Discussion  Asad Khan, Lucas Vogelsang, Colin Cunningham, and Kevin Chan 0:56  Centrifuge: A partners view of Real-World Assets1920×1060 171 KB   Disclaimer1632×929 150 KB   Table of Contents1631×931 109 KB   DeFi: Fixing a very broken system1635×931 140 KB   Volatility: The Case for RWAs1632×930 158 KB   On-chain RWAs to grow DeFi1635×932 111 KB   Our history: Maker + Centrifuge1633×937 94.2 KB   Our goal at Centrifuge1632×932 122 KB   Where We Are Today1631×931 125 KB   Where We Are Going1632×932 134 KB   The Tipping Point1634×933 100 KB   On MetaDAOs1632×933 111 KB   What would this look like?1633×933 156 KB   Bringing Dai to the Real World1633×930 132 KB   Q&A: Is everything clear?1634×932 131 KB   Questions 24:34 - Kianga Daverington: How would you articulate the value proposition of decentralization, censorship resistance, and no single point of failure, both for MakerDAO’s future prospects…? 26:42 - Tim B: Can you explain what an arranger is? 33:43 - ImdioR CFG: The risks of RWA seem far greater than decentralized collateral. Why should Maker engage with assets that can be taken away? 35:37 - ImdioR CFG: How does Centrifuge protect Maker’s investment? 38:56 - CodeKnight: How does this compare to current on-chain credit providers like Truefi, Maple, and Goldfinch? 41:57 - Joe King: Do you see a future where energy projects (like battery facilities and Solar panel farms)are financed on-chain? 43:31 - Raphael: Can you clarify who the counterparty for Maker MetaDAOs would be? Centrifuge or BlockTower? 45:33 - ImdioR CFG: Talking about diversification. What is the Centrifuge team’s view on implementing another stablecoin that could be used for Tinlake/Cent Pools(once launched)? 47:55 - Marcus: What do you believe is the biggest bottleneck for onboarding RWAs on-chain?  Closing Comment  Retro  Outro 52:37  Thanks to everyone. Stay tuned to the forums for the latest news. We look forward to seeing the work that Centrifuge is doing. I appreciate the support that you give to our ecosystem. Have a great day.   Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.
